TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ItemCheckEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 和 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the and controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选中的列表框中的项的选中状态更改时发生此事件。The event occurs when the checked state of an item in a checked list box changes. 类指定要更改的项的索引、该项的复选框的当前值，以及要为复选框设置的新值。The class specifies the index of the item to change, the current value of the check box for the item, and the new value to set for the check box. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 用于处理事件的选中控件 。The following code example demonstrates a checked control that handles the event. 方法使用对象的 和 属性 来检索和计算选定菜单项的价格。The method uses the and properties of the object to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的和名为的的窗体中 `ListView1` `Textbox1` 。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `ListView1` and a named `Textbox1`. `InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 确保所有事件都与其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示该项的复选框的当前状态。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the current state of the item's check box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够在 检查状态更改进行应用之前确定中指定项的检查状态。This property enables you to determine the check state of the specified item in the before the check state change to apply is made. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 用于处理事件的选中控件 。The following code example demonstrates a checked control that handles the event. 方法使用对象的 和 属性 来检索和计算选定菜单项的价格。The method uses the and properties of the object to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的和名为的的窗体中 `ListView1` `Textbox1` 。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `ListView1` and a named `Textbox1`. `InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 确保所有事件都与其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来确定正在更改哪个项的复选框 。You can use this property to determine which item's check box in the is being changed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 用于处理事件的选中控件 。The following code example demonstrates a checked control that handles the event. 方法使用对象的 和 属性 来检索和计算选定菜单项的价格。The method uses the and properties of the object to retrieve and tally the price of the menu items selected. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的和名为的的窗体中 `ListView1` `Textbox1` 。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `ListView1` and a named `Textbox1`. `InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 确保所有事件都与其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView2/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将该项的复选框设置为选中、未选中或不确定。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to set the check box for the item to be checked, unchecked, or indeterminate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够在控件更改检查状态之前确定指定项的新的检查状态 。This property enables you to determine the new check state for the specified item before the check state is changed by the control. 除了确定新的检查状态之外，还可以在事件处理程序中将此属性用于事件的事件处理程序，以 将状态更改为不同于指定的检查状态。In addition to determining the new check state, you can use this property in an event handler for the event to change the state to a different check state than the one specified. 例如，如果用户在您根据应用程序的状态而不应检查您确定的中的项旁边放置了一个复选标记 ，则可以通过将此属性设置为其上一个设置或其他检查状态来覆盖选中标记状态中的更改。For example, if the user placed a check mark next to an item in the that you have determined should not be checked based on the state of your application, you can override the change in the check mark state by setting this property to its previous setting or to a different check state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `CheckedListBox1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CheckedListBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#156](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#156)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#156](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#156)]
